title: SPOILER TALK! Star Wars Andor Season 1 FINALE - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com to shop their Black Friday selections.

Tim, Barrett, Saige, and Carboni give their reaction and review of Star Wars Andor on Disney Plus starring Diego Luna.

Follow Saige: https://twitter.com/NotSaige    
Follow Anthony: https://twitter.com/acarboni  

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1
